oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Residue Avoidance in the Veal Industry
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Grover, Wayne M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: residue avoidance
Extra Label Use
veal industry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The right to use drugs in an extra label fashion, concurrent with a valid veterinarian-client-patient relationship, has given veterinarians an awesome responsibility. Veterinarian must not take that responsibility lightly. Each individual practitioner must establish his or her own guidelines to determine what circumstances necessitate the Extra Label Use (ELU) of drugs. The primary challenge of ELU is determining the withdrawal times necessary to avoid residue problems.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1985; 104-105
